title: Cobalt Core Pentester - Async Remote Job
snippet: cobalt: cobalt core pentester - async remote job about newsletter partners contact job categories full-stack programming front-end programming back-end programming data & analytics devops & sysadmin sales & customer success marketing & content product, ux & design management & finance all other what is async? blog bars post a job from $99 post a job from $99 what is async? blog subscribe to our newsletter about partners contact cobalt core pentester cobalt üåç anywhere in the world all other posted: aug 8 source of job post who we are the cobalt core is a community of highly skilled security pentesters who are passionate about what they do and who are always striving to be at the top of their game. this curated community is made up by security professionals with many years of experience as well as talented pentesters who are eager to learn the trade and show their skills. they all have a strong drive to keep up to date on the latest vulnerabilities and exploits, and the tools and methodologies to find them. a member of the cobalt core believes that sharing ideas and collaborating with peers is the best way to achieve good results. if you believe you would be a good fit to join the cobalt core, and you are eager to contribute to the community and participate in the pentests running on cobalt please apply. if you are currently residing in the usa, please apply here . who you are 3+ years of pentesting or similar experience professional demeanor respectful towards others take pride in the work you produce strong work ethic with attention to detail desire to be an expert within your field deep understanding of application security ability to communicate effectively collaborative spirit what you'll do perform manual penetration testing of web applications, apis, internal and external networks, ios and android mobile applications work as a member of a pentest team, collaborating and engaging directly with the client document in detail the results of assessments, audits, tests, and verification activities perform manual validation of vulnerabilities perform mobile and web app pentesting for owasp top 10 vulnerabilities. the following certifications are a plus: crest, pentest+, gpen, ceh, oscp, aws, cissp, ecppt, ewapt, osce, oswe application process: applicants need only apply once and may not receive a response from our team. we review applications on a rolling basis and will reach out to a candidate should there be a mutual alignment. repeated inquiries after applying and across social media is not favorable. application - becoming part of the cobalt core is a highly selective process, and only the best applicants will be invited to next steps in the on boarding process. preference will be given to applicants who come referred by other cobalt core pentesters. chat with a cobalt representative - get to know about cobalt and how we work. we will also want to know about you, your experience, strengths and what drives you. if we all think it's a great fit, we will
